info.title: Decision Service API
info.x-generated-client: Python client generated from this specification

servers.description: Local mock server for development and testing

get.summary: Get algorithm result using session id, name and area id.

parameters.name: areaId
parameters.description: Uniquely identifies the area within the session.

schema.description: Uniquely identifies the area within the session.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name type of the algorithm result.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

400.description: A 400 is returned if an invalid algorithm name is used.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the given area id does not exist in the database or no data found for the given area id.

500.description: A 500 is returned if an internal error is found.

get.summary: Get all algorithm results using session id, name and parent area id.

parameters.name: parentAreaId
parameters.description: Uniquely identifies the parent area within the session.

schema.description: Uniquely identifies the parent area within the session.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

400.description: A 400 is returned if an invalid algorithm name is used.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the given parent area id does not exist in the database or no data found for the given parent area id.

204.description: A 204 is returned if no record is found.

500.description: A 500 is returned if an internal error is found.

get.summary: Get latest algorithm result using session id, name and parent area id.

parameters.name: parentAreaId
parameters.description: Uniquely identifies the parent area within the session.

schema.description: Uniquely identifies the parent area within the session.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

400.description: A 400 is returned if an invalid algorithm name is used.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the given parent area id does not exist in the database or no data found for the given parent area id.

204.description: A 204 is returned if no latest record is found.

500.description: A 500 is returned if an internal error is found.

get.summary: Get the current (or last known) state of the application.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

post.description:
Sample requests:
            
    POST
    {      
      "state": "idle",
      "sessionId": "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6"
    }
    
or

    POST
    { 
      "state": "running",
      "sessionId": "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6",
      "areaId" : 1213,
      "details" : "running autofocus"
    }

requestBody.description: The new state of the application.

201.description: A 201 is returned if operation succeeds.

get.summary: Get all the tracked application states for the given application session.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the requested session has not been registered.

get.summary: Get the registered area for application session.

parameters.name: areaId
parameters.description: Uniquely identifies the area within the application session.

schema.description: Uniquely identifies the area within the application session.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the requested application session has not been registered or the requested area did not exist in the database.

get.summary: Get all the registered areas for application session, optionally filtered by area type or parent.

parameters.name: parentAreaId
parameters.description: (Optional)The parent area of the areas to retrieve.

schema.description: (Optional)The parent area of the areas to retrieve.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the requested application session has not been registered.

get.summary: Get all the registered child areas of the given area.

parameters.name: parentAreaId
parameters.description: Uniquely identifies the parent area in the application session.

schema.description: Uniquely identifies the parent area in the application session.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful

404.description: A 404 is returned if the requested application session has not been registered.

201.description: A 201 is returned if operation succeeds.

400.description: A 400 is returned if the application session id is not filled in or an illegal area id is used.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the specified application session has not been registered.

409.description: A 409 is returned if the area has already been registered.

requestBody.description: The area to be updated or to be registered in case not registered yet.

201.description: A 201 is returned if operation succeeds.

400.description: A 400 is returned if the application session id is not filled in.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the specified application session has not been registered.

201.description: A 201 is returned if operation succeeds.

400.description: A 400 is returned if the application session id is not filled in.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the specified application session has not been registered.

409.description: A 409 is returned if (some of) the area have already been registered.

put.summary: Update multiple registered areas and register new ones.

requestBody.description: The areas to be updated or to be registered in case not registered yet.

schema.description: The areas to be updated or to be registered in case not registered yet.
The areas to be updated or to be registered in case not registered yet.
The areas to be updated or to be registered in case not registered yet.
The areas to be updated or to be registered in case not registered yet.

204.description: A 204 is returned if operation succeeds.

400.description: A 400 is returned if the application session id is not filled in.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the specified application session has not been registered.

get.summary: Get a specific area state.

parameters.name: areaStateId
parameters.description: Uniquely identifies the area state within the application session.

schema.description: Uniquely identifies the area state within the application session.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

400.description: A 400 is returned if an invalid state id is used.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the given application session has not been registered or the given area state does not exist in database.

get.summary: Get the latest state of the registered area.

parameters.name: areaId
parameters.description: Uniquely identifies the area within the application session.

schema.description: Uniquely identifies the area within the application session.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

400.description: A 400 is returned if the application session id is not filled in or an illegal area id is used.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the given application session has not been registered or the given area does not exist in database.

get.summary: Get multiple area states for the given application session, optionally filtered by area type or parent area id.

parameters.name: parentAreaId
parameters.description: (Optional)The parent area of the area states to retrieve.

schema.description: (Optional)The parent area of the area states to retrieve.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the given application session has not been registered.

post.summary: Notify that an area state has changed.

201.description: A 201 is returned if operation succeeds.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the specified application session and/or area has not been registered.

post.summary: Notify state changes of multiple areas.

201.description: A 201 is returned if operation succeeds.

400.description: A 400 is returned if the application session id is not filled in or an illegal area id is used.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the specified application session and/or area has not been registered.

get.summary: Get a specific decision.

parameters.name: decisionId
parameters.description: The id of a specific decision record.

schema.description: The id of a specific decision record.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

400.description: A 400 is returned if an invalid decision id is used.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the given application session and/or decision has not been registered.

get.summary: Get the most recent decision that is available for the given area.

parameters.name: areaId
parameters.description: Uniquely identifies the area within the application session.

schema.description: Uniquely identifies the area within the application session.

parameters.name: pluginType
parameters.description: The plugin was used in taking the decision.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

400.description: A 400 is returned if an illegal area id is used.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the requested application session, area and/or decision has not been registered.

204.description: A 204 is returned if no latest record is found.

get.summary: Get the most recent decision that is available for the given area.

parameters.name: areaId
parameters.description: Uniquely identifies the area within the application session.

schema.description: Uniquely identifies the area within the application session.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Timeout window in seconds within which a relevant decision shall be found. If timeout is reached 204 NoContent will be sent.

schema.description: Timeout window in seconds within which a relevant decision shall be found. If timeout is reached 204 NoContent will be sent.

parameters.name: pluginType
parameters.description: The plugin was used in taking the decision.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

400.description: A 400 is returned if an illegal area id is used.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the requested application session, area and/or decision has not been registered.

204.description: A 204 is returned if no record is found.

500.description: A 500 is returned if an internal error is found.

get.summary: Get all the decisions that are available for the provided area ids, and optionally filtered by type.

parameters.name: areaIds
parameters.description: Uniquely identify the area(s) within the application session.

schema.description: Uniquely identify the area(s) within the application session.

parameters.name: pluginType
parameters.description: The plugin was used in taking the decision.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation was successful.

400.description: A 400 is returned if an illegal area id is used.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the requested application session has not been registered.

delete.summary: Delete all matching decisions. The match is performed on SessionId, AreaId and DecisionType (the later if specified)

parameters.name: areaId
parameters.description: Uniquely identifies the area within the application session.

schema.description: Uniquely identifies the area within the application session.

204.description: A 204 is returned if operation is successful.

400.description: A 400 is returned if an illegal area id is used.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the given application session and/or areaId has not been registered.

201.description: A 201 is returned if operation succeeds.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the specified application session and/or area has not been registered.

201.description: A 201 is returned if operation succeeds.

400.description: A 400 is returned if the provided decision collection is empty.

409.description: A 409 is returned if the given application session and/or area has not been registered.

204.description: A 204 is returned if operation is successful.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the given application session has not been registered.

get.summary: Get decision service configuration.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

404.description: A 404 is returned if there is no configuration available.

500.description: A 500 is returned if an internal error is found.

201.description: A 201 is returned if operation succeeds.

400.description: A 400 is returned if the corresponding configuration is not supported.

500.description: A 500 is returned if an internal error is found.

delete.summary: Delete a registered decision service configuration.

204.description: A 204 is returned if operation is successful.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the configuration has not been registered.

patch.summary: Patch the existing smart plugin configuration
patch.description:
Sample request:

    PATCH
    {        
      "PluginName": "StageSettlingTimePrediction",
      "CustomPluginSelection": true
    }

Sample response:

    RESPONSE
    {        
      "PluginName": "StageSettlingTimePrediction",
      "CustomPluginSelection": true,
      "Timestamp" : "10/20/2022 14:38"
    }

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the corresponding plugin has not been registered.

500.description: A 500 is returned if an internal error is found.

get.summary: Get name-value record with provided id.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful

400.description: A 400 is returned if an illegal name-value record id is used.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the requested application session has not been registered or the requested area does not exist in database.

get.summary: Get all name-value records for the given application session, optionally filtered by area type or/and name.

parameters.name: areaId
parameters.description: Uniquely identifies the area within the session.

schema.description: Uniquely identifies the area within the session.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name given to the record.

schema.description: The name given to the record.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

400.description: A 400 is returned if an illegal area id and/or name is used.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the requested application session has not been registered or the requested area does not exist in database.

201.description: A 201 is returned if operation succeeds.

400.description: A 400 is returned if the application session id is not filled in or an illegal area id and/or name is used.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the specified application session has not been registered.

requestBody.description: The name-value records to be registered.

schema.description: The name-value records to be registered.
The name-value records to be registered.
The name-value records to be registered.
The name-value records to be registered.

201.description: A 201 is returned if operation succeeds.

400.description: A 400 is returned if the application session id is not filled in.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the specified application session has not been registered.

get.summary: Get an application run.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the requested application session has not been registered or the requested run does not exist in database.

get.summary: Get all application runs.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The id that uniquely identifies the application session.

schema.description: The id that uniquely identifies the application session.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the requested application session has not been registered or the requested run does not exist in database.

post.summary: Notify that an application run has started.

requestBody.description: The information about the application session for which the run starts.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the corresponding application session has not been registered.

patch.summary: Notify that an application run has stopped.

requestBody.description: The information about the application session for which the run stopped.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the corresponding application session has not been registered.

get.summary: Get an application session.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the requested application session has not been registered.

delete.summary: Delete a registered application Session from the decision store.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the specified application session has not been registered.

get.summary: Get a session filtered by session name.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

400.description: A 400 is returned if the session name is invalid or empty.

404.description: A 404 is returned if the requested application session has not been registered.

post.description:
Sample request:

    POST
    {        
      "sessionName": "My Session"        
      "sessionId" : "b5cdbfb9-bd0f-414e-93f8-0abca3331f8e"
    }
    
or, to auto-generate a session id
    
    POST
    {        
      "sessionName": "My Session"        
    }

requestBody.description: The application Session to register; sessionName is mandatory. If sessionId is not specified, it's auto-generated.

201.description: A 201 is returned if session is successfully created.

400.description: A 400 is returned if the session name is invalid or empty).

409.description: A 409 is returned an application session with the same name or id has already been registered.

get.summary: Check if a session with given id has been registered.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

get.summary: Get all registered sessions.

200.description: A 200 is returned if operation is successful.

get.summary: Get status from Athena APIs.

200.description: Success

get.summary: Get Decision Service version.

200.description: Success

404.description: Not Found
